name: Hogeschool Gent
goal:
University of Applied Sciences Ghent (HOGENT) consists of three faculties – Education,Health and Social Work; Science and Technology; Business and Information
Management –, a School of Arts and a supporting Service Centre. Its 24 departments are responsible for 41 study programmes based on eight
campuses in Ghent, Aalst and Melle. HOGENT counts 14,000 students and 1,800
members of staff, including over 200 researchers in national and international
research projects. HOGENT aims for excellence in education, research, services to society and
artistic practice. Through the competence of its staff and graduates and the
valorisation of its research, HOGENT seeks to advance a critical, creative and
open society.
euInitiatives: We follow all Research and Innovation aspects including everything which is related to it.
